item.title: Bash
item.description: Bash Essentials special symbols hotkeys source vs. sh foreground and background jobs Bash Script Examples The following paragraphs explain shell tricks and concepts that are very helpful in everyday use. They are mostly not commands. special symbols >: pipe into file, overwriting >>: append to a file &>>: append both stdout and stderr &: run program in child process (e.g firefox &) |: pipe to another application -: ?
